flow.name: Remove VM Snapshot from InfraDB

scriptlet.name: Operation Remove VM Snapshot from InfraDB (f33dc7ae-0e63-44b5-bd3b-580454c77a03)

staticBinding.value: SELECT SNAPSHOTID FROM CMOSNAPSHOTS WHERE SERVERID = '${serverServerID}' AND STATUS ='00_ACTIVE'
SELECT SNAPSHOTID FROM SNAPSHOTS WHERE SNAPSHOTNAME = '${serverVmSnapshot}'

scriptlet.name: Step TNS Names SQL Command (retry) in Flow Remove VM Snapshot from InfraDB (72c0f56d-fa4a-4b37-a522-9a22b812ae1f)
